txt.en: You have given each cat in Furtherholm's harbour area a bite to eat. You should report to Maghôrdo at Furtherholm's harbour, near the waterfall.
TBD
Many stray cats have made the Furtherholm harbour their home, and you think they should stay.
Feed the scruffy cat
Feed the skinny cat
The scruffy cat nips your finger as it greedily takes the treat
Feed the slinky cat
Return to Maghôrdo
The skinny cat eyes you suspiciously but purrs as it takes your offering
Feed the smelly cat
The slinky cat takes the treat followed by a quick bath

'You think the cats should stay? I am relieved to hear it! Removing them may invite disaster to strike!

'Besides, you cannot always make everyone happy. I have also heard of places rife with cats that travellers visit specifically to see them! I would visit such a place myself, [placeholder].

'Now that I think of it, I will reward you if you go around the harbour and give a tidbit to each cat, to ensure they stay. Everyone knows if you feed a cat, they will always return.'

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends.</rgb>
Maghôrdo has asked you to visit each cat in Furtherholms harbour area and give them a bite to eat.
The smelly cat swallows the treat whole and rubs on your leg
Feed the sleepy cat
Talk to TBD
The sleepy cat purrs as it takes the treat and goes back to sleep
Feed the sassy cat
Completed Cat Conundrum: Yes to Cats
The sassy cat snaps up the treat, hisses, and runs away
TBD
Cat Conundrum: Yes to Cats
